title: Privacy Policy
section1Body: This service treats the protection of personal information as a key responsibility and handles it in accordance with this policy. This policy describes the information we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it.
section2Body: We may collect the following information.
section2Item1: Information you provide when registering (email, display name, etc.)
section2Item2: Information collected automatically (IP address, browser type, access time, etc.)
section2Item3: Information you provide when contacting support
section3Body: We use collected information for the following purposes.
section3Item1: Providing, maintaining, and improving the service
section4Body: We do not share personal information with third parties without consent, except as required by law. We may entrust information to trusted service providers under appropriate agreements.
section5Body: We may use cookies and similar technologies to improve usability and understand usage. You can disable cookies in your browser, but some features may not work.
section6Body: For inquiries about this policy, please contact us through the service contact form.
